name: Westinghouse Electric UK Holdings Ltd.
bossPosition: President Europe, Middle East & Africa Region
goal: Westinghouse Electric Company is a leading supplier of nuclear plant products and technologies to utilities throughout the world. Its technology is the basis for half of the world's operating nuclear reactors, including 60% of the ones in the EU. It has operations in seven Member States employing 4000 people.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Energy Union
Energy and Climate 2030 Framework
ETS Reform and MSR
